Version: 0.10.0.20892

OS: Windows 10

CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060

Expected Behaviour: When Delete key is pressed part should be deleted

Observed Behaviour: When delete key is pressed part is delted AND messege pops up saying flight mode has changed

Steps to replicate: Not entirley sure, but i launched an empty rocket (so couldnt be controled) and then reverted to VAB

Workaround: I have no clue but it isnt game breaking so im not fussed.

Edited February 26, 2023 by fpb105
Image
Just loaded up the game again and its still an issue.
When it gets in this mode the shift and cntrl keys make "engine" sounds as well.
